Room.Name: Entryway to the Palace of Keslar
Room.ShortDescription: You are outside the great palace of Keslar, the great wizard.
Room.LongDescription: The sign on the door says "Welcome to Keslar's Palace / Now Go Home!". Not a very friendly person, but mages seldom are. The palace, from what you can see of it, is huge. Two great oak doors stand to the south of you leading into the palace.
